page.title: 14Our School
page.content: Our school,built at the bottom of Darklaw Hill is open to the wind.It has two classrooms,two toilets and a staffroom in the newer building.The older building was the school until the newer building was built in the late nineteen twenties.It is now used as a dining room with the dinners brought from Cupar by van.One of the classrooms is for the primaries 1-3 while the other is for the 4-7s.we have a secretary who works between Rathillet and Creich primaries.We have a T.V.,a video,radio-cassette recorders, a small cooker and a BBC model "B" computer with disk drive to help us with our work.We share our sports day with Creich and Dunbog schools and our educational outings with Creich as all these schools have just over 20 pupils each.Five visiting teachers also attend our school.
